alert.note: Alert for Curry County; Roosevelt County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 23 at 9:06PM MST until November 24 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...North winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Curry County and Roosevelt County. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs may be blown down. Expect strong crosswinds on west-to-east oriented roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A gusty cold front will shift the wind direction out of the north after midnight tonight. The strongest winds will occur from around sunrise until mid-afternoon on Thursday.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.
